author: FourFourTwo
description: Oscar is enjoying life at Shanghai SIPG, and he would be happy if Diego Costa joined him in China.
title: Oscar: I'd be delighted if Costa joined me in China

author: http://xml.zeit.de/autoren/L/Felix_Lee/index.xml
description: Anders als von Xi Jinping beim Seidenstraßen-Gipfel behauptet, ist China alles andere als offen und multilateral. Sein industriepolitischer Plan zielt auf Vorherrschaft.
title: China: Schlaue Doppelstrategie

author: Nina Strochlic
description: As China modernizes and sees a rising middle class weddings have become big business, and a way for couples to show off both their wealth and their personality.
title: Behind the Scenes of China's Over-the-Top Wedding Shoots

author: Harriet Sinclair
description: The Russian president said he wanted to be involved in the China’s nearly one trillion dollar proposal to open a new Silk Road.
title: Why Russian President Vladimir Putin is backing China's new Silk Road project

description: China’s authorities are increasingly worried by stress in the country’s financial system and the sudden slowdown in economic growth, fearing that it may now be too dangerous to press ahead with their draconian crack-down on shadow banking.
title: China signals retreat on credit crack-down as stress mounts

author: Alastair Gale
description: Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe called for further efforts from China to tackle the rising threat from North Korea after its latest missile launch.
title: Japan’s Abe: China Has Pivotal Role to Play on North Korea

author: Andrea Wong
description: China increased its holdings of U.S. Treasuries by the most in two years, a sign that the world’s second-biggest economy is stabilizing and stricter capital controls have helped to stem capital flight.
title: China Increases U.S. Treasury Holdings by Most in Two Years

description: "India hopes that it can shape bilateral relations more actively, and expects China to give special attention to the interests of India. But this is not how countries interact," an editorial in Global Times said.
title: 'India's objections to China's OBOR forum a show for domestic politics' - Times of India

description: North Korea’s launch of a longer-range missile shows advances in its technological capabilities and offers the sternest test yet of President Trump’s strategy to work with China to combat the threat.
title: North Korea missile launch tests Trump's China outreach

description: Sri Lanka, which attended the just concluded Belt and Road Forum here, has backed India's concern over the Kashmir issue, saying it is difficult for New Delhi to accept the $50 billion China-Pakistan Economic Corridor (CPEC) as it goes through the "heart of Indian interests".
title: Sri Lanka backs India's concerns over China's OBOR project - Times of India
